coffees.name: Signature Blend
coffees.description: A rich, full-bodied coffee with notes of dark chocolate and black cherry. Grown on the slopes of a mist-covered mountain in Central America.

coffees.name: Golden Sunrise
coffees.description: A smooth and bright coffee with a citrusy kick. Sourced from the rolling hills of Africa.

coffees.name: Rainforest Rhapsody
coffees.description: An earthy and complex coffee with notes of toasted nuts and caramel. Sustainably grown in the rainforests of South America.

coffees.name: Harvest Moon
coffees.description: A smooth and earthy blend with notes of cocoa and hazelnut.

coffees.name: Wildfire
coffees.description: A bold and smoky blend with notes of dark chocolate and molasses.

coffees.name: Walnut Wonder
coffees.description: A smooth and nutty coffee from the slopes of South America.

coffees.name: Breezy Beans
coffees.description: This coffee blend is made from beans sourced from Honduras and Costa Rica. It is a light roast coffee with a bright and citrusy flavor profile. It is perfect for pour-over and drip coffee brewing methods.

coffees.name: Indo-Viet Roast
coffees.description: This coffee blend is made from beans sourced from Indonesia and Vietnam. It is a medium-dark roast coffee with a spicy and earthy flavor profile, with notes of cinnamon and clove. It is perfect for drip and French press brewing methods.

coffees.name: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe
coffees.description: A light and fruity coffee with notes of blueberry and citrus. Grown in the highlands of Ethiopia, this coffee is sure to brighten up your morning.

coffees.name: Lazy Days
coffees.description: A medium-bodied coffee with a sweet and nutty flavor. Grown in the lush regions of Brazil, this coffee is perfect for a lazy afternoon.

coffees.name: Andean Almond
coffees.description: A smooth and mellow coffee from the mountains of South America, with hints of almond and toffee.

coffees.name: Savanna Noir
coffees.description: A bold and rich coffee from the African savanna, with notes of dark chocolate and blackcurrant.

coffees.name: Coconut Kiss
coffees.description: A light and refreshing coffee from the shores of the Asia Pacific, with a subtle coconut flavor.

coffees.name: Arabian Nights
coffees.description: A bold and spicy coffee from the Middle East, with notes of cardamom and cinnamon.

coffees.name: Midnight Mocha
coffees.description: Indulge in the rich, velvety flavors of this decadent mocha blend. Dark chocolate and espresso notes are combined with a touch of vanilla for a luxurious coffee experience.

coffees.name: Himalayan Heights
coffees.description: Grown on the steep slopes of the Himalayan Mountains, this coffee is known for its bright acidity and delicate floral notes. This light roast is perfect for those who prefer a more delicate flavor profile.

coffees.name: Sumatra Blend
coffees.description: Get your day started with the bold and earthy flavors of Sumatra. Grown on the lush tropical slopes of the Gayo Highlands, this coffee is known for its full body, low acidity, and notes of dark chocolate and smoke.

coffees.name: Bali Bliss
coffees.description: Escape to the tropical paradise of Bali with this smooth and mellow blend. Grown on small family farms, this coffee is shade-grown and hand-picked for a rich and nuanced flavor profile. Notes of milk chocolate, hazelnut, and a hint of tropical fruit.

coffees.name: Central Perk
coffees.description: A medium roast coffee with a smooth, nutty flavor and a hint of caramel. Inspired by your favorite coffee shop!

coffees.name: Chilean Charm
coffees.description: This coffee boasts a smooth and balanced flavor, with notes of chocolate, caramel, and a hint of fruit. It has a medium body and a subtle acidity that will leave you feeling refreshed and energized.

coffees.name: Caffè Verona
coffees.description: Well-balanced and full-bodied, Caffè Verona® is a storied dark roast with notes of dark cocoa and caramelized sugar.

coffees.name: Pike Place® Roast
coffees.description: A smooth, well-rounded blend of Latin American coffees with subtle notes of cocoa and rich praline, it's perfect for every day.

coffees.name: Sumatra
coffees.description: This single-origin dark coffee has bold flavor and notes of rich herbs and rustic spice.

coffees.name: Breakfast Blend
coffees.description: Notes of sweet orange and brown sugar mingle in our lightest medium roast coffee.

coffees.name: French Roast
coffees.description: With notes of dark caramel and sweet smoke, the explosive flavor of French Roast is as dark as our dark roasts get.

coffees.name: House Blend
coffees.description: Aroma, body and flavor all in balance. House Blend is a medium roast with notes of toffee and dusted cocoa.

coffees.name: Espresso Roast
coffees.description: A classic and time-honored dark roast with notes of molasses and caramelized sugar that’s perfect for making classic espresso drinks.

coffees.name: Starbucks® Veranda Blend®
coffees.description: Our lightest roasted coffee with notes of toasted malt and milk chocolate.
